Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-flamingo-theme-ui.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 12.6.6 before 13.10.11, all versions starting from 14.0-rc-1 before 14.4.7, all versions starting from 14.5 before 14.10
NotImpacted: All versions before 12.6.6, all versions starting from 13.10.11 before 14.0-rc-1, all versions starting from 14.4.7 before 14.5, all versions starting from 14.10
